detail_desc: Maxi dress in woven fabric with a V-neck front and back and narrow shoulder straps. Elasticated seam at the waist and a straight-cut, softly draping skirt with high slits in the sides. Partly lined.
Maxi dress in woven fabric with a V-neck front and back and narrow shoulder straps. Elasticated seam at the waist and a straight-cut, softly draping skirt with high slits in the sides. Partly lined.
Maxi dress in woven fabric with a V-neck front and back and narrow shoulder straps. Elasticated seam at the waist and a straight-cut, softly draping skirt with high slits in the sides. Partly lined.
Maxi dress in woven fabric with a V-neck front and back and narrow shoulder straps. Elasticated seam at the waist and a straight-cut, softly draping skirt with high slits in the sides. Partly lined.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with a hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit jumper in soft merino wool with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit jumper in soft merino wool with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Knee-length, fitted dress in a soft rib knit with a v-neck.

Long, off-the-shoulder dress in a crinkled viscose weave with smocking at the top and short sleeves. Overlocked edges at the top and on the sleeves. Seam at the waist and a gently flared, draped skirt with a slit in one side. Partly lined skirt.
Fine-knit, slightly longer jumper in slub cotton with ribbing around the hood, cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit, slightly longer jumper in slub cotton with ribbing around the hood, cuffs and hem.
Short, straight-cut jersey dress with narrow shoulder straps.
Cardboard glasses in various sizes and designs.
Cardboard glasses in various sizes and designs.
Shorts in a textured linen blend with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, tie belt, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Shorts in a textured linen blend with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, tie belt, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Marled suit trousers in an Italian wool weave with a lightly brushed finish. Extended waistband with a button and concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, pockets in the side seams, flap back pockets with a button and legs with creases and turn-ups at the hems. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette. For matching jacket look for: 0506221.

Tuxedo trousers in a wool weave with satin stripes down the sides of the legs. Extended waistband with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly and button, side pockets and jetted back pockets. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Short, flared dress in woven fabric with hemstitching and narrow adjustable shoulder straps. V-neck at the front and a deep V-neck with lacing at the back. Unlined.
Short, pattern-weave shorts with elastication at the back of the waist and a tie belt. Lace-trimmed side pockets and a small frill trim at the hems. Unlined.
Imitation suede mules with open toes, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels, 7 cm.
Imitation suede mules with open toes, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels, 7 cm.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details in a relaxed fit over the hips and thighs and skinny fit over the calves. Regular waist and button fly.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details in a relaxed fit over the hips and thighs and skinny fit over the calves. Regular waist and button fly.
Long, fine-knit jacket with notch lapels and front pockets. Unlined.
Long, fine-knit jacket with notch lapels and front pockets. Unlined.
Long, fine-knit jacket with notch lapels and front pockets. Unlined.

Straight-cut utility jacket in a cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets, and large front pockets with a flap and press-stud. Adjustable tab and buttons at the back and buttoned cuffs. Unlined.

Straight-cut utility jacket in a cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets, and large front pockets with a flap and press-stud. Adjustable tab and buttons at the back and buttoned cuffs. Unlined.

Straight-cut utility jacket in a cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets, and large front pockets with a flap and press-stud. Adjustable tab and buttons at the back and buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Derby shoes in grained imitation leather with open lacing at the front and a decorative welt seam around the soles. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 2 cm.
Boots with a decorative welt seam around the soles, padding around the top of the shaft and lacing at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel 3.5 cm.
Fancy dress costume in jersey with a zip down the front and a hood with an eye mask at the front.
All-in-one suit in marled, fine-knit thermal fleece with a stand-up collar, zip down the front and raglan sleeves.

Two-button jacket in stretch wool with narrow notch lapels, an open chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a back vent. Lined. Skinny fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.

Two-button jacket in stretch wool with narrow notch lapels, an open chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a back vent. Lined. Skinny fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Joggers in soft, light sweatshirt fabric with a washed look. Elasticated drawstring waist, a back pocket and legs with seams and narrow ribbed hems.
Beach towel in a soft cotton weave with fringes on the short sides. Supplied with a carry strap. Size 100x180 cm.
Beach towel in a soft cotton weave with fringes on the short sides. Supplied with a carry strap. Size 100x180 cm.

Fancy dress costume in jersey consisting of a cape, sleeveless top and plastic vampire teeth. The cape has a high collar and hook and loop fastening at the front. The top has a turtle neck and a print motif on the front.
Fancy dress gloves in jersey with a glow-in-the-dark print.
Textured-knit hat in a soft cotton blend with a small imitation leather appliqué, ribbing at the hem, earflaps and ties under the chin. Cotton jersey lining.
Santa hat with a faux fur pompom on top and wide, covered elastication around the hem.
Santa hat with a faux fur pompom on top and wide, covered elastication around the hem.
Dress in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with long sleeves and a flared skirt.
Dress knitted in a cotton blend with a pattern knit at the top and long sleeves. Seam at the waist and a bell-shaped skirt with a lace trim at the hem.
Rib-knit hat with an appliqué on the turned-up hem and a faux fur pompom at the top.
5-pocket, slim-fit, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with embroidered appliqués, a high waist and button fly.
5-pocket slim-fit trousers in stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, and decorative stitching on the legs.
Cargo trousers in a stretch cotton blend with a zip fly and button, side and back pockets, and flap leg pockets with a press-stud. Decorative stitching at the knees.
Ankle boots in imitation nubuck with a padded edge, lacing at the front, pile linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel 7.5 cm.
Glasses chain in metal decorated with sparkly glass stones. Length 97 cm.
Two-strand choker in imitation suede with a bow at the front with metal beads at the ends. Adjustable length, 29-37 cm.
Knee-length shorts in cotton twill with pleats at the front and a zip fly and button. Side pockets and welt back pockets with a button.

Shirt in a textured cotton weave with a cutaway collar, classic front, and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Yoke at the back, a contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
